titles.title: Medicaid Newborn Coverage Act of 2009
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to waive the requirement for proof of citizenship during first year of life for children born in the United States to a Medicaid-eligible mother.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Medicaid Newborn Coverage Act of 2009 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to waive the requirement for proof of citizenship during the first year of life for children born in the United States to a Medicaid-eligible mother.
